{"id":1075510546,"question_id":3165,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"8Â months","timestamp":1697340684,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1075510546/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Indices With Index and Value Difference I","memory":"43.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int[] findIndices(int[] nums, int indexDifference, int valueDifference) {\n        int[] res = new int[]{-1, -1};\n        \n        int len = nums.length;\n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            for(int j=i+indexDifference; j<len; j++){\n                \n                if(Math.abs(nums[i]-nums[j])>=valueDifference){\n                    return new int[]{i, j};\n                }\n                \n            }\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-indices-with-index-and-value-difference-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
